question: How likely is it that you would product this company to a friend or colleague? 5 being extremely likely and 1 being not likely at all.
Overall, how satisfied or dissatisfied are you with our product?
On a scale of 1 - 5 how well do our products meet your needs? 5 being extremely well, 1 being not at all well.
On a scale of 1 - 5, how responsive have we been to your questions or concerns about our products? 5 being extremely responsive, 1 being not at all responsive.
Do you have any other comments or suggestions?
